title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
History; 


Broken display, changed it and it worked for 20 minuts. Now chime CPU is heating but GPu is cold. 

Things i already tried 

- changed U9300
- Reflow U9600 and U9650, No change. 


J8300 pins 28-30 0V. 
GPUVcore 0V


No line seems to be shorted.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
No reason to measure J8300, if no GPU VCORE present.
Image MUST appear before the backlight.

Post basic voltages for U9300; pins 17, 16, 25, 38.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
So GPU VCORE is not even enabled.
Check GPU rail sequencing at page 66...

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message: P1V8GPU_EN is missing ans as than all rail go after this one are missing too. I see it is generated by U9600. Reflow? Can it be take from any board or it's like SMC and must take it from same board?

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message: Do you get GPU_PGOOD1?

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message: i cant find where ti measure it. There is no component or point on GPU_PGOOD1

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message: if it's same as PP3V3_S0GPU than i am getting 0V

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
PP3V3_S0GPU_FET that seems to be same line you are asking me is pulsing to 0.5 V when magsafe connected and than goes down 


P.S: All measerments are made with LCD disconnected

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
What's the reason to measure video signals without LCD?
Post Q8090 voltages.
Check diode mode to ground at =PP3V3_S0GPU_FET.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
Q8090

1,2 - 0V
3 - 3.3V
4-7 - 3.3


Diode mode for PP3V3_S0GPU_FET 0.472


Now LCD is connected

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message: Just have checked with display connected values u asked me before are same.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
Missing =P3V3GPU_EN?
I supposed to be present, as you said
"P1V8GPU_EN is missing"
which is next AFTER 3V3GPU...

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
P3V3GPU_EN is present 3.3V

P1V8GPU_EN  is missing.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message: Then post Q8092 voltages.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
P3v3gpu_en 3.3
p3v3gpu_en_l - 0v

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message: Sorry wrong previous two measerument. I have p3v3gpu_en_l  3.3V and P3v3gpu_en is 0V

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
"P3V3GPU_EN is present 3.3V
--------------------
P3v3gpu_en is 0V"
Please...

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
P3V3GPU_EN  is missing. In openboardview when you search for P3V3GPU_EN  it mark you P3V3GPU_EN  and P3V3GPU_EN_L so i measured and got 3.3. 

Here is correct value: 


On Q8092 

Pin 3 ( P3V3GPU_EN_L) is 3.3 V
Pin 1 (P3V3GPU_EN ) is 0V

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
Did you check SMC_LID level?
Nothing change if connect external monitor?

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
SMC_LID 3.4V. 


I tried to connect external by HDMI and Thunderbolt nothing changes. 


Usually this models get GPU hot when you turn it on. In my case it's completly cold. Only CPU is heating.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
Why do you expect hot GPU, if doesn't get voltage?
You probably have a problem with U9600 now; reball it.
If no result, change it.
Maybe need to change U9300 too.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
about 9600 it can be taken from 3332 or must be same board like smc?

u9300 already changed

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
U9600 has firmware and pick it from same model board.
I'm not sure if works from other board...

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
ok. changed ( reballed left same result. Changed both u9600 and U9300 for second time, but same result


Any other suggestion?

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
Bad GPU probably...

Do you get GMUX_SLP_S3_BUF_L?
Check U9600 (SYM 3 OF 3) area.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
GMUX_SLP_S3_BUF_L is present 3.4V


And SYM 3 OF 3 Area cant see anything bad. 


IF GPU is bad why its not powering even if bad.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
"SYM 3 OF 3 Area cant see anything bad"
Voltage rails and reset good?
Do you get oscillation at Y9600?

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
DPMUX_UC_RESET_L
DPMUX_LRESET_L 

both 3.3V

About Y9600 cant tell you, dont have osciloscope right now.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message: Should I suppose both power rails OK?

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message: Yes. Both must be 3.3 tha right? If so both are ok.

title: 820-3787 no image external/Internal
message:
I can only suspect bad GPU.
It has more blocks, apart of CORE.
Some of its blocks should talk with CPU, before GPU VCORE is enabled, I suppose.
Could even be a CPU issue, on the communication side with GPU...
